name: virtual-desktop-manager
title: Virtual Desktop Manager
description: Manage Windows virtual desktops directly from Raycast using AutoHotkey. Brings hyprland like experience to windows.

commands.name: view-shortcuts
commands.title: View Keyboard Shortcuts
commands.description: View all available keyboard shortcuts at a glance

commands.name: edit-keybindings
commands.title: Edit Keybindings
commands.description: Customize keybindings for all commands

commands.name: run-keybindings-daemon
commands.title: Run Keybindings Daemon
commands.description: Start or reload the background keybindings script

commands.name: stop-keybindings-daemon
commands.title: Stop Keybindings Daemon
commands.description: Stop the background keybindings script

commands.name: go-to-desktop-1
commands.title: Go to Desktop 1
commands.description: Switch to virtual desktop 1

commands.name: go-to-desktop-2
commands.title: Go to Desktop 2
commands.description: Switch to virtual desktop 2

commands.name: go-to-desktop-3
commands.title: Go to Desktop 3
commands.description: Switch to virtual desktop 3

commands.name: go-to-desktop-4
commands.title: Go to Desktop 4
commands.description: Switch to virtual desktop 4

commands.name: go-to-desktop-5
commands.title: Go to Desktop 5
commands.description: Switch to virtual desktop 5

commands.name: go-to-next-desktop
commands.title: Go to Next Desktop
commands.description: Switch to the next virtual desktop

commands.name: go-to-previous-desktop
commands.title: Go to Previous Desktop
commands.description: Switch to the previous virtual desktop

commands.name: move-to-desktop-1
commands.title: Move Window to Desktop 1 & Follow
commands.description: Move the active window to desktop 1 and switch

commands.name: move-to-desktop-2
commands.title: Move Window to Desktop 2 & Follow
commands.description: Move the active window to desktop 2 and switch

commands.name: move-to-desktop-3
commands.title: Move Window to Desktop 3 & Follow
commands.description: Move the active window to desktop 3 and switch

commands.name: move-to-desktop-4
commands.title: Move Window to Desktop 4 & Follow
commands.description: Move the active window to desktop 4 and switch

commands.name: move-to-desktop-5
commands.title: Move Window to Desktop 5 & Follow
commands.description: Move the active window to desktop 5 and switch

commands.name: move-window-stay-1
commands.title: Move Window to Desktop 1 (Stay)
commands.description: Move window to desktop 1 without following

commands.name: move-window-stay-2
commands.title: Move Window to Desktop 2 (Stay)
commands.description: Move window to desktop 2 without following

commands.name: move-window-stay-3
commands.title: Move Window to Desktop 3 (Stay)
commands.description: Move window to desktop 3 without following

commands.name: move-window-next-desktop
commands.title: Move Window to Next Desktop
commands.description: Move the active window to the next desktop and follow

commands.name: move-window-previous-desktop
commands.title: Move Window to Previous Desktop
commands.description: Move the active window to the previous desktop and follow

commands.name: create-desktop
commands.title: Create Desktop & Switch
commands.description: Create a new virtual desktop and switch to it

commands.name: create-desktop-stay
commands.title: Create Desktop (Stay)
commands.description: Create a new desktop but stay on current

commands.name: remove-desktop
commands.title: Remove Current Desktop
commands.description: Remove the current virtual desktop

commands.name: ensure-desktops
commands.title: Ensure 5 Desktops Exist
commands.description: Create desktops until at least 5 exist

commands.name: pin-window
commands.title: Toggle Pin Window
commands.description: Toggle pin window to all desktops

commands.name: explicit-pin-window
commands.title: Pin Window
commands.description: Pin the active window to all desktops

commands.name: explicit-unpin-window
commands.title: Unpin Window
commands.description: Unpin the active window

commands.name: check-window-pinned
commands.title: Check Window Pinned
commands.description: Check if the active window is pinned

commands.name: pin-app
commands.title: Toggle Pin App
commands.description: Toggle pin app to all desktops

commands.name: explicit-pin-app
commands.title: Pin App
commands.description: Pin the active app to all desktops

commands.name: explicit-unpin-app
commands.title: Unpin App
commands.description: Unpin the active app

commands.name: check-app-pinned
commands.title: Check App Pinned
commands.description: Check if the active app is pinned

commands.name: get-current-desktop
commands.title: Show Current Desktop
commands.description: Show which desktop you're currently on

commands.name: get-desktop-count
commands.title: Show Desktop Count
commands.description: Show total number of virtual desktops

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: sameed_majgaonkar
